unnormalised: Brand Buzz: Collaborations are the New Samosa!
normalised: Brand Buzz: Collaborations are the New Samosa!

unnormalised: Social media is buzzing, folks! Forget the same old ads, brand collaborations are the new go-to strategy, especially with Diwali just around the corner. We're seeing crazy pairings everywhere!
normalised: Social media is buzzing, folks! Forget the same old ads, brand collaborations are the new go-to strategy, especially with Diwali just around the corner. We are seeing crazy pairings everywhere!

unnormalised: Take, for example, fashion influencer, Isha Sharma, teaming up with Haldiram's to promote their Diwali gift hampers. Talk about a sweet deal! And who would’ve thought to see a fitness guru like Rohan Kapoor collaborate with a biryani chain? He's showing off the "healthy-ish" options, apparently.
normalised: Take, for example, fashion influencer, Isha Sharma, teaming up with Haldiram's to promote their Diwali gift hampers. Talk about a sweet deal! And who would have thought to see a fitness guru like Rohan Kapoor collaborate with a biryani chain? He is showing off the "healthy-ish" options, apparently.

unnormalised: Even the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delhi is getting in on the action, partnering with a tech startup to research and promote AI-powered social media analytics tools. Smart move!
normalised: Even the Indian Institute of Technology (I I T) Delhi is getting in on the action, partnering with a tech startup to research and promote A I-powered social media analytics tools. Smart move!

unnormalised: Analysts are predicting a 25% increase in brand collaborations this festive season compared to last year. It's all about reaching new audiences and injecting some fresh energy into marketing campaigns. Get ready for your feeds to be flooded with these partnerships – it's gonna be wilder than a Mumbai local train at rush hour!
normalised: Analysts are predicting a twenty five percent increase in brand collaborations this festive season compared to last year. It is all about reaching new audiences and injecting some fresh energy into marketing campaigns. Get ready for your feeds to be flooded with these partnerships – it is going to be wilder than a Mumbai local train at rush hour!
